Reviews.Content: stayed 2 days champ de mars business trip montreal budget hotel offered package reading reviews scared specially customer service im glad chose champ de mars service people friendly restaurant taste home cooking loved hotel little renovated located heart montreal corner recommend hotel traveling budget
